name: Tamra C. Morgan
text: I got 2 new tires; the ones they recommended to me by saying "these help with road noise & WET road conditions".  Well, that SOLD me!  The friendly staff fixed me right up within a couple of hours (on a late Friday afternoon).  I was impressed with the service.   My CRV drives like a new one!

name: Deborah jordan
text: I went in to have my air conditioner checked. Turned out to be a minor problem. The cost was reasonable, the service professional, and the people very nice. I will definitely use them again.

name: A B
text: I've been a loyal customer for going on 7 years. They're fair, the mechanics are good and helpful, and they won't price gouge you.

name: Nicole Henderson
text: Y'all - I absolutely love this place. After being a firestone customer for about 8 years i came across this place thanks to a friend and i will never go anywhere else for car maintenance. There is never any BS, upselling... none of that. These are just good guys wanting to make an honest living without trying to give you a headache and have you worry about something going wrong and needing immediate replacement (cough, cough Firestone).

name: Jay Trawick
text: Great service and a great price on new tires 👍

name: Jane Moder
text: We were on the road to Florida when one of our brakes hung up and was smoking. RoadMart in Dothan got us back on the road in short order. thanks!!

name: Diane Blackmon
text: Great service friendly atmosphere.  Honest on mechanical issues. Pricey but good work.

name: C Rubel
text: Good service at a fair price. Will return in the future...

name: Brook Smith
text: Love this place. 💙 Convenient and quiet. Very nice staff. They don't steal stuff from your car like some places. 💗

name: K King
text: Came here bout 3 yrs ago for 1 problem & left with another. They gave me my vehicle back and it would barely crank- they inspected it & told me I needed a new sensor- I called another mechanic to tow it & when he inspected it he said someone had disconnected the sensor & I didnt need a new one! Low & behold he was right- he connected it back for free & I went on my way & never looked back! I consider this a scam operation

name: Greg Feldhusen
text: Best auto mechanic shop in Dothan. They always take care of my brakes, alignments, tires, and oil changes. I am a customer for life!

name: Tierra Nichols
text: I can think of 3 times you guys (all under the watchful eye of Chase) have come to my rescue in less than years time.  The first time I brought my car in for tires and ya'll looked it over and pointed out things that needed to be fixed and helped me map out a timeline as well.(many garages would tell ya it all had to be done right then).  Second time through trial and error we got my A/C up and running. Then most recently I found my self having to make frequent trips to bham and my car started overheating.  You guys got it right in and fixed that too!!!  Just got back from Bham and not once did it even act like it was thinking about over heating.  HEROS I tell ya!!!!!!  You guys rocks.  Thank you so much.  See ya in 3 months for my next oil change!!!!

name: Hubert Bramlett
text: Excellent service

name: Cheryl Christian
text: Excellent

name: Michael Hughes
text: They charge double of any other car maintenance center! And they don't back up theire work!I do not recommend them to anyone!

name: Irene Osewe
text: The guys there are amazing.  Great guest service.

name: Linda Owens
text: Was sent away without even checking automobile. Apparently he was not interested in dealing with my problem.

name: kathy senft
text: Thank you for the quick valve stem replacement !

name: Kimberly Vickers
text: It's not often these days one finds a business that truly cares about their customers. Thanks everyone there for taking care of me quickly and extending compassion to a grieving daughter.

name: c nelson
text: My review comes nearly 6 months later but these guys took care of my car quickly and professionally. They went above and beyond to get us back on the road.

name: Kristen
text: Best customer service anywhere! Great service by honest people.

name: Tommy Huff
text: Mike and his staff are very courteous and most helpful.

name: Kathy Zeigler
text: These folks are awesome! Always ready to help, great customer service!

name: carl deangelo
text: great bunch of guys, treat you like they want you back.

name: Justin Hamilton
text: Went into roadmart because my brakes were squealing really bad and all the other places was charging 300 and over for pads and rotors and i wasn't able to afford the cost.  roadmart did the job for a far cheaper price and did a very nice job.   Their mechanic with the name of gene was personable and friendly and described everything very well.    i would certainly go back no questions asked

name: Mary Akridge
text: 5 stars to Roadmart ! Thank you so much for your great service, great prices and honesty today !

name: Michael Stephen Bateman Jr
text: You will not find more professional or experienced staff anywhere else. Absolutely satisfied every time.

name: Sierra Eutsey
text: I've been coming to RoadMart for two years now and I am now having the worst time with them. I brought my car in a week ago because the front end of the car was not driving properly. RoadMart said that they could not replicate the issue but they did see I needed my tires balanced, I let them balance my tires and when I left I was having the same issues. I brought my car back and then they said the tires were  separating on the inside, so I paid 367 for four brand new tires. Replacing the tires only helped the car drive smoother but the problem was now worse! So I brought my car back today and now there saying that the back tires are the cause of the front tires shifting and that wasn't something they could fix, I would have to take it to the dealership. The guy said he could try to align the front to see if that would help but it made the issue even worse then when I had initially brought the car in. I am now sitting here after closing hours so they can set my alignment back to were it was. I just feel like if they were unable to repair the car in the first place then they should've said so instead of me coming out of 446 dollars for no reason. I asked if I could a refund for the alignment and the guy said that he wouldn't be able to refund me, would have to wait until next call and ask for a refund or he could credited as two free oil changes which is not acceptable for my inconvenience

name: Chris McClenny
text: Great service

name: TC Parks
text: Polite and friendly staff.

name: James Cribbs
text: They went the extra mile one night and stayed until my car got fixed. I'll be a road mart customer for life.

name: John Crum
text: Best mechanics in town

name: Brandon Palmer
text: The only place I'll take my truck to be worked on.

name: Michael Skinner
text: Great job on tires, alignment, and brakes

name: Robin Evans
text: Way to long for just an oil change

name: Racheal Muccio
text: Ok service

name: Sergio De Leon Castillo
text:
(Translated by Google) I like

(Original)
Me gusta

name: grace skidmore
text:
Their motto is to treat you like family and they do! professional, friendly caring and kind this team exhibits performance excellence. They are expeditious and knowledgeable plus willing to go the extra mile to get the job done. When they have to deliver less than desired news they are forthright and honest. The integrity of this outfit is refreshing to find and is a credit to the long history and tradition of being customer-centric.

John and his crew will take care of you and your auto repairs. No need to go anywhere else.

name: Ashraf Hijaz
text: Best customer service in town, no Ethanol in their fuel.

name: Jose Vazquez
text: Personable and kind staff. My car battery died and they had someone come tow my car right away. The mechanic got to it really quick and my vehicle was ready for pick up the same day. The mechanic took his time to explain other issues he saw and was able to address — he even called ahead and asked if I wanted my oil changed. Highly recommend bringing your car here. Just call ahead and ask if it’s busy since the shop is pretty small compared to others.

name: Charlie Pennell
text: Cloverdale Service Center is my go to place for all work needed on my car. Great service and always professional. Anyone needing any work done on their vehicles check out Cloverdale Service Center.  John and his team always treat me like family.

name: Penny Weaver
text: There's lots to like about Montgomery's Cloverdale neighborhood, and at the top of that list is Cloverdale Service Center. Not only is it a convenient stop for high-quality gas, John and his skilled staff provide prompt, dependable service on most anything your car may need. Need a set of tires? John can suggest the best choice for your vehicle, order and install them with no hassle for you. We dropped our car off at closing time on Monday, and it was ready to go, new tires in place and aligned, before 11 the next morning. It is a comfort to have a reliable resource like Cloverdale Service Center nearby.

name: Amanda Giddings
text: I got stuck in Montgomery on my way home from Pensacola and was fortunate enough to find this amazing auto shop. They managed to fix my car despite it being hard to find parts near them and got me back on the road within a day. With me being a college student traveling alone and getting stuck somewhere I’ve never been, I was beyond grateful to have found this place. They showed me the problems with my car that led to it breaking down and told me exactly how they intended to fix it as well as how much it would cost. The people there were also very kind and accommodating. If I lived in the area, this would be my go to auto shop and I certainly intend to go there again if I ever find myself in the area. I recommend this without question for anyone seeking auto services in this area.

name: Two Brothers Pressure Washing
text: The Best Auto shop in montgomery! All the staff are super knowledgeable, friendly, and treat you like family. Plus they will check your car while they pump your gas!

name: John Martello
text: Excellent work done quickly and successfully at a very fair price.  I can't recommend Cloverdale Service Center enough.  Also, they're a bunch of good guys!

name: Jorge Serafin
text: Friendly, professional, and reasonable prices.

name: Art Sullivan
text: Great place to take your car or truck.Friendly service. Knowledgeable mechanics.

name: Kat Serafin
text: Honest work and fair prices.  I paid $100 to the Toyota dealership mechanics to plug in the computer and tell me nothing was wrong with my car - I doubt they even lifted the hood, let alone test drove it!  John at Cloverdale Service inspected and replaced burned out spark plugs and corroded battery wire - something the previous mechanics should have easily diagnosed if they'd bothered to look past the computer screen!  Got everything fixed up, plus oil change, for an extremely reasonable price, and now my 13 year old car runs like new!  This is my go-to mechanic from now on!

name: Dan Hendrix
text:
Cloverdale Service Center's great.

They always exceeded my expectations.

That's true for service, price, advice, and a genuine concern.

John keeps a good crew.

I trust them like family.

You should too.

name: Retta L
text: They don’t specialize in Volkswagen but they helped me anyway. I HIGHLY recommend Cloverdale Service Center!!! Highly recommend them!!

name: Shenika Braxton
text: Best quality service. Owner very helpful and high sprited.

name: jcanpalate
text: Omg... i think this place might be my new car shop. Friendly and good service

name: Andrea Wheeler
text:
New to the area and didn't know anyone who could suggest somewhere to get my car worked on who I could trust. Looked online and saw "family environment", "great people", "great service" frequently associated with Cloverdale. Those reviews were nothing short of the truth. All of the staff was extremely friendly, helpful and genuinely cared not only about getting me in and out, but made a lasting impression on me personally.

I only had minor service done, but my time was not wasted ...like you normally feel when you sit at a car shop for hours just to get an oil change. I was in and out in less than 30 minutes!

I would suggest Cloverdale to any and everyone I know.

name: MacGregor Hodges
text: The original old time trusted neighborhood Gas Station with Full Automotive Service by top of the line mechanics.

name: Kyle Brock
text: Great old school gas station ran by honest people doing hard work. Best place to get gas, have tires repaired/changed, and they take care of most other auto repairs.  Check out their old school customer bell and gas attendants fill gas.

name: Sarah Spratling
text: Best service and WOW are the people nice. I trust them with my car and they keep me rolling

name: Debra Todd
text: Very friendly and helpful. I will recommend and go back for all of my automobile needs.

name: Rodney Foster
text: Great place love the people

name: Tereza U Ancelet
text: Great service and customer support.  If you want a reliable #servicecenter in  Montgomery, this is the place.

name: Zando Zan
text: Wonderful service. Met with one of the mechanics. Was honest and did not try to upsell. Definitely going back.

name: ben skelley
text:
John is a great guy running an a honest and quality oriented business, and has real gasoline to boot.
Thanks CSC

name: Rochelle Smith
text: Great reliable service. Truly appreciate their honesty.

name: Ken Spear
text: What can I say? John and his crew are as honest as mechanics come. In the past, I've had bad experiences by those who take advantage of those who are not as savvy when it comes to automotive knowledge. At any rate, my late-model Lincoln Towncar was on the blink. I checked with several outlets and the prices quoted ranged from unreasonably low to outrageously high. Cloverdale Service Center's quote fell somewhere in the middle. My car is rolling like new again just when I had planned to trade it in for something else. Well, it looks like I can drive it a little while longer. Thanks CSC!

name: Virginia Reeder
text: Family oriented Very nice and cozy

name: Sandra Hicks Larson
text: Great people

name: Lamon Dees
text: Good Job!!!!

name: Joe Mcclendon
text: Awesome place

name: anna b
text: Amazing people and service!

name: angelisa davis
text: Love it

name: Bob Boone
text: They are full service, put in gas, check oil  and tire pressure and clean the windows. You don't even have to get out of your car. The staff calls you by name and the only sell 100% gas no ethonal.

name: Bryan Hassler
text: Has non ethanol gas and knowledgeable personnel.

name: Ryan Lee
text: Great service , in and out 5minutes

name: Laura Aubele
text: Great service!
